definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Flow property testing should be part of routine pre-engineering work, he says.
sentences.chinese: 流動性是日常先期工程工作的一部分，他說。
蔗糖是日常飲食中必不可少的。

sentences.english: But within reason, flirting is part and parcel of our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但當然了，調情是我們日常生活中不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: Quite a number of imprecise words are used in our everyday speech.
sentences.chinese: 我們的日常用語中有相當一部分是不確定詞。

sentences.english: Because the abacus is a daily-use device made from wood, few of them have survived.
sentences.chinese: 因爲算盤是一種木質的日常用具，流傳下來的很少。

sentences.english: For me , I should try to save electricity in my daily life .
sentences.chinese: 對於我來說，我應該努力節電在我的日常生活。

sentences.english: The routine proceeding organ of Guangxi Lawyers Association is the chairmen's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 廣西律師協會日常的議事機構是會長辦公會。

sentences.english: Men often overlook their ears during their regular grooming session.
sentences.chinese: 男人們在日常裝扮中經常會忽視掉耳朵。

sentences.english: What precautionary measures should Asthma sufferers take in their daily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哮喘病患者日常生活中應採取什麼預防措施？

sentences.english: Where spending hours in the sun is a daily summer habit, more and more sunbathers are using sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 曬太陽是夏天日常習慣，越來越多的人用太陽油。

sentences.english: Slowly insidiously the fog of the everyday has returned to enshroud me.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地，不知不覺地，日常的迷霧又回來籠罩了我。

sentences.english: Designers shows us the beauty of the every-day in “snapshot”.
sentences.chinese: 設計者通過“快照”向我們展示了日常生活中的美。

sentences.english: Caption : BEIJING, CHINA - A daily moment of hutong named:weijia, during the early winter in beijing. a homeless cat on a window.
sentences.chinese: 北京初冬時節衚衕裏日常生活，一隻流浪貓在窗臺上。

sentences.english: In everyday style, it's a blank canvas on which we can base an ensemble.
sentences.chinese: 還日常風格中，它是能進行百搭的一個基礎。

sentences.english: I can use all kinds of translative tools (Trados). I am a professional, so I have enough time to work.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名自由職業者，日常工作日均有充足空閒時間。

sentences.english: The society was not even in funds to pay its out of pocket disbursements.
sentences.chinese: 該社團甚至沒有經費應付日常開支。

definition: to live at home/to stay at home/home (schooling etc)/in-home (care etc)/household (repairs etc)/living (environment etc)
